subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: The Indy Racing League is cutting two days from its Indianapolis 500 practice schedule to save money. The move is “clearly a response to the economic times,” the I.R.L. spokesman John Griffin said.
snippet: The Indy Racing League is cutting two days from its Indianapolis 500 practice schedule to save money. The move is “clearly a response to the economic times,” the I.R.L. spokesman John Griffin said.
